title: Sebastian the fox: the animal catcher
brief_description: Another adventure for Sebastian the Fox when he is caught by Professor Catchem, licensed animal catcher and pet shop owner. A young boy decides to buy Sebastian when he sees him in the display window, but Sebastian is too clever and outsmarts the boy and the professor. Puppets by Peter Scriven. Music by George Dreyfus.
